summary: ALL DASH BOARD ELECTRONICS SHUT DOWN FOR NO APPARENT REASON.  INCLUDES SPEEDOMETER, RADIO, DASH LIGHTS, AND ALL GAUGES AND WARNING LIGHTS.  NEVER REPRODUCED FOR REPAIR SHOP.  HEADLIGHTS AND TAIL LIGHTS CONTINUE TO FUNCTION.   SYSTEMS REGAIN POWER FOR NO APPARENT REASON, STOPPING AND STARTING THE ENGINE IS NOT HELPFUL.   *NLM
